amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, ensures that the Commission will be funded exclusively by licensing fees on the boxing industry participants and not from appropriations of general funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in part B of House Report 109-295 to strike provisions in section 14 of the bill relating to Authorization of Appropriations and inserting in lieu thereof provisions for Receipts Credited as Offsetting Collections.

action.text: Sodrel amendment (A004) modified by unanimous consent. As offered, the amendment sought to strike section 14 in its entirety. As modified, amendment inserts provisions for receipts credited as offsetting collections in lieu of provisions relating to authorization of appropriations.
On agreeing to the Sodrel amendment (A004) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
